metadata.title: CVE-2022-36316 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When using the Performance API, an attacker was able to notice subtledifferences between PerformanceEntries and thus learn whether the targetURL had been subject to a redirect. This vulnerability affects Firefox <103.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
